scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.seed: dotenv -e backend/.env -- npx prisma generate && dotenv -e backend/.env -- npx ts-node backend/scripts/createTestUsers.ts
scripts.push: f() { if [ -z "$1" ]; then echo 'Error: Commit message is required. Usage: npm run push -- "your message"'; exit 1; fi; git add . && git commit -m "$1" && git push; }; f
